attributes.action: Ammend or Replicate The Public Order ( Domestic Football Banning 1999) Act to allow the police to apply for banning orders  for other sports grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim of this petition is to either create an ammendment or a new statute to allow the police to apply for banning orders from i.e Rugby league /rugby union grounds of known trouble makers. At present the trouble maker would have to be banned from each ground individually. therfore  the ban should apply to all ( specified sport) grounds on the first offence
